prompts.prompt:
Write a {length} summary from the following text in {format} format, with {extractiveness} extractiveness.

Write for the reader using clear, active, concise sentences and avoid meta-statements. Separate facts, analysis, and recommendations; avoid jargon (briefly define if necessary) and prevent overlap between points.

Document contents:
###
{documentContents}
###

template.name: ai-doc-summarizer
template.title: Document-based summary
template.description: Get a summary from only provided document contents

arguments.name: documentContents
arguments.description: The text or data the answer must be based on

arguments.name: extractiveness
arguments.description: Controls how close to the original text the summary is

arguments.name: additionalCommand
arguments.description: A free-form instruction for modifying how the summaries get generated.
